newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Soosan Heavy buys large stake in Seyang.
newsitem.headline: Soosan Heavy buys large stake in Seyang.

text.p: South Korea's Soosan Heavy Industries Co Ltd has become the largest shareholder in Seyang Shipping Co Ltd, the Korea Stock Exchange said on Tuesday.
The stock exchange said in a statement that Soosan had purchased 556,678 shares, or 22.66 percent, of Seyang's shares outstanding at 5,000 won per share over the counter.
Seyang has a total stock capital of 2.46 million shares.
The purchase was completed on Monday, the bourse said.
On Tuesday, Soosan's stock fell 100 won to close at 17,100 while Seyang rose 260 won to 3,570.
